location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babingten [Babington], Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Stephen Babingten [Babington], Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, acknowledging the receipt of a letter dated 14 December 1813, and informing that Torab Beg, deputed by the Persian Government, intended to remain in Bombay until Lieutenant Robert Taylor returned from Bushire to accompany him to Calcutta.
